channel.title: Could not find or
channel.description:
Could not find or load main class then a URL follows after it.
I know this probably sounds pathetic, but I'm trying to learn this stuff and the only way to is to give it a go, trouble shoot continuously and obtain knowledge from others.
So i've installed everything required, so no 'ant' errors or 'javac' errors... Set all my env's under the computer system. Basically what is happening is when I compile my client side or my server side, the RSCD / java file itself deletes...
Then I compile it does nothing, doesnt even change the XML file, I tried this with the server side as well, does the same thing.. gives me the " Could Not find or load main class " error and also deletes the RSCD / Java file.. Basically the error is happening at run, but without the compiler working correctly, I would imagine why...
I've troubleshooted everything I possibly could, i've turned all the links in Google PURPLE lol and I just am stumped... I know you guy's hate noobies like myself but help a noob out, give me that bronze long haha

item.title: Could not find or
item.dc:creator: @its2013 its2013
item.description:
@its2013 wrote:

I dont recall saying im not a noobie, infact i said i was in the end, but anyhow I’m assuming this would be under a envt right? probably PATH?

EDIT: Nvm… stupid thought where does this go
EDIT AGAIN: the -XM looks familiar like i’d run as in eclipse and set it in the config? But im not very good with eclipse yet neither…

Tried another source, EASYRSC this time and now i’m getting Java.exe not found so im assuming if I use that snipplet you gave me this should work. Help me out with that snipplet? pleaseeeeee

OK now what is happening since ive played with it a bit more is this:

ERROR: The process “java.exe” with PID 4588 could not be terminated.
Reason: Access is denied.
Buildfile: C:\Users****\Desktop\EasyRSC\Server\build.xml

compile:
[delete] Deleting: C:\Users****\Desktop\EasyRSC\Server\rscd.jar
[mkdir] Created dir: C:\Users****\Desktop\EasyRSC\Server\build
[javac] C:\Users****\Desktop\EasyRSC\Server\build.xml:13: warning: ‘include
antruntime’ was not set, defaulting to build.sysclasspath=last; set to false for
repeatable builds
[javac] Compiling 167 source files to C:\Users****\Desktop\EasyRSC\Server\b
uild

THAT ERROR IS FOR THE COMPILE SIDE OF SERVER, although i dont think the server will run at all because of this…

I havnt messed with the client side at all yet im more concerned about the server atm.

last edit, fixed problem, close thread if want…

So I back tracked myself, everything was good then i went over envt’ runtimes, and well there was a small tiny mistake lol… that caused all of this trouble so I took care of that, then I tried to run again and got a taskill error, i simply removed that and run it again, POOF the server started up, now im working on getting it online and hopefully into a browser within the next week

OH Yeah and RSCEasy was missing a lot of Def’s that I had to add as well… such an easy client NOT, got to add missing stuff, and deal with crap errors… but other servers are even more complicated atm for me

Im a genius haha, a newbie one too i guess… trouble shoot, trouble shoot, and never give up because eventually it will give in!

Read full topic

item.title: Could not find or
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

EDIT: You say you aren’t a newbie, so I guess I don’t need to hold your hand. Try this:

Origin:

"Program Files\java\jdk1.7.0\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024M src/Server

After:

"Program Files\java\jdk1.7.0\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024M -cp .; src/Server

Read full topic

item.title: Could not find or
item.dc:creator: @its2013 its2013
item.description:
@its2013 wrote:

Could not find or load main class then a URL follows after it.

I know this probably sounds pathetic, but I’m trying to learn this stuff and the only way to is to give it a go, trouble shoot continuously and obtain knowledge from others.

So i’ve installed everything required, so no ‘ant’ errors or ‘javac’ errors… Set all my env’s under the computer system. Basically what is happening is when I compile my client side or my server side, the RSCD / java file itself deletes…

Then I compile it does nothing, doesnt even change the XML file, I tried this with the server side as well, does the same thing… gives me the " Could Not find or load main class " error and also deletes the RSCD / Java file… Basically the error is happening at run, but without the compiler working correctly, I would imagine why…

I’ve troubleshooted everything I possibly could, i’ve turned all the links in Google PURPLE lol and I just am stumped… I know you guy’s hate noobies like myself but help a noob out, give me that bronze long haha
